#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll co;
ll n;
ll arr[1110];
void do_it(ll ind,ll s)
{
	
	if(ind==n)
	return;
	if(s*arr[ind]!=1)
	{
		ll ss=sqrt(s*arr[ind]);
		if(ss*ss==s*arr[ind])
		{
			//cout<<s<<" ";
			co++;
		}
	}
	do_it(ind+1,s*arr[ind]);
	do_it(ind+1,s);
}
int main()
{
	ll t,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		//ll n;
		cin>>n;
		co=0;
		ll count=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>arr[i];
			if(arr[i]==1)
			count+=1;
		}
		do_it(0,1);
		co+=pow(2,count)-1;
	//	cout<<endl;
		cout<<co<<endl;
	}
}
